participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, with a passion for history and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I was bullied for being overweight as a child. I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them. I'm going to make a banana smoothie to help me recover from my workout and then head to the bar to check on things. I am divorced. I am a civil war reenactment participant.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, with a love for sweets and a busy lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I love getting my favorite coffee from Starbucks after a long day at the lab. I cannot get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth. I watch CSI to take my mind off things. I am not sure what my ethnic background is. I started working for myself so I could be more flexible with my time and still be able to take care of my toddler.

content.text: I just got back from the gym. I'm gonna make a banana smoothie to help me recover from my workout and then head to the bar to check on things.
That sounds like an exhausting day, but I'm sure it will be worth it when you get to enjoy that banana smoothie!
Thanks. I'm really hoping that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them. I've been working on them for a while now and I'm really proud of them.
That's awesome! I'm sure they'll be great. What kind of comics do you draw?
I draw mostly historical comics. I'm a big fan of the Civil War and I love learning about history in general.
That's really cool! I'm not a huge history buff, but I can definitely appreciate a good comic.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what else do you do for fun?
Well, I like to go to the gym, like I said. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love video games too. What's your favorite game?
I'm a big fan of the Zelda series. I've been playing them since I was a kid.
Oh, that's a good one! I've never played any of them, but I've heard good things.
You should definitely check them out! They're a lot of fun
